name: Space trip 2
description:
DOWNLOAD THE GAME FOR FREE

SPACE TRIP 2 is a videogame that consists in a space shooter where you will need to travel since the earth to neptune, where you will be able to:

-Destroy the enemy spaceships

- To shoot asteroids

- Defeat final bosses

- customize your vehicle

- Much more

We would like to get support us by making it more famous a single download or to spread the word to your friends can be very helpful for us
